sqls.sql: SELECT PhaseID, PhaseName, PhaseDesc, MissionTime, EnvironmentID, PrjName FROM CSYS_Phase WHERE PhaseID=:PhaseID
SELECT PhaseID, PhaseName, PhaseDesc, MissionTime, EnvironmentID, PrjName FROM CSYS_Phase
INSERT INTO CSYS_Phase (PhaseID, PhaseName, PhaseDesc, MissionTime, EnvironmentID, PrjName) VALUES (:PhaseID, :PhaseName, :PhaseDesc, :MissionTime, :EnvironmentID, :PrjName)
UPDATE CSYS_Phase SET PhaseID=:PhaseID, PhaseName=:PhaseName, PhaseDesc=:PhaseDesc, MissionTime=:MissionTime, EnvironmentID=:EnvironmentID, PrjName=:PrjName WHERE PhaseID=:PhaseID
SELECT PhaseID, PhaseName, PhaseDesc, PrjName FROM CSYS_Phase
